import React from 'react'; import { CheckCircleIcon, ArrowRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const About = () => { const features = [ 'State-of-the-art dental technology', 'Experienced and compassionate team', 'Comfortable and relaxing environment', 'Comprehensive treatment plans', 'Emergency care available 24/7', 'Family-friendly atmosphere' ]; return (
{/* Image Column */}

Modern Dental Clinic

Professional & Caring Environment

{/* Decorative Elements */}
{/* Content Column */}
+ ABOUT US

Your Journey to a Healthier Smile Begins Here

The goal of our clinic is to provide friendly, caring dentistry and the highest level of general, cosmetic, and specialist dental treatments. With dental practices throughout the world.

{/* Features List */}
{features.map((feature, index) => (
{feature}
))}
); }; export default About;
